file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 20-30-04-02 - CLEANING PRODUCTS - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CLEANING PRODUCTS - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This subchapter gives a list of the products approved to be used on, and for the servicing of, the aircraft, with their most usual suppliers. B. You must refer to the correct procedure to use the products in the chapters shown below. C. Do not mix all the products with the same specification MIL-, FED. SPEC., but of different makes. D. Possible alternative products are listed opposite the same group of chapters where the indicated product(s) is(are) referenced to. E. Products listed on the QPL (Qualified Products List) for specifications MIL referred to in this subchapter are automatically approved to be used on the aircraft. F. The supplier/manufacturer addresses are listed in the section AMM MPP 20-30-00/200. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 20-30-04 Page 1 of 6 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
